attributes.action: New Halal system to make food labelled Halal or Haraam including fast food.
attributes.additional_details: I hope that everyone who reads my petition will share it with everyone they know and will help bring about a change in the community. I hope there will be a time when you can go to the shopping centre with no worry about the food and if it is Halal. Halal meat is meat that is killed by cutting the spinal cord which means that the animal dies a painless death. Please help me bring about a big change in the UK for all people no matter what their religion. Thanks in advance, no matter who you are!
attributes.background:
When I was a kid, I was always unsure about what I was eating. d
Due to this, I couldn't eat most food. I want all people, Muslims or not, to feel assured that their food is Halal or Haraam. Please help me and our community.
